::Jhiaxus/Zarak-Scorponok/Dark Rodimus::
   
  Jhiaxus drew his weapons ready for whatever happens. He was ready to follow Hydras. He noticed that the base submerging action had been countered in the computers.
   
  Jhiaxus: Whoever is in the base has access to the secured computer systems. Where is the best place for someone to hack into it? Perceptor, reverse whatever they did and get us submerged.
   
  Zarak grabs the bound Nightlight and drags her back towards her cell. They come across the Megatron statue and back down the corridor untill they reach the special cell door.
   
  Zarak: Open.
   
  The door swings open. Zarak removes Nightlight's restraints and pushes her in, sealing the cell. He turns and runs back through the corridor. Once past the statue he meets up with the Scorponok shell. Zarak transforms to the head module and connects with Scorponok, now in bot mode.
   
  Scorponok follows the directions he got from Hydras.
   
  Dark Rodimus is activated and becomes councious. The first thing he does is swat the spider-spy off of his neck. He doesn't realize what it was. Rodimus exits the room to find Jhiaxus, Hydras and Perceptor.
   
  Dark Rodimus: What is the situation? Who needs to die?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras/nightlight:

<Thanks my friend>said Nightlight's spark to Azureblade <Thanks to 
stay with me>

Nighlight still was crying, she tried to calm down and find the way 
to left that doomed place together her husband, she open her spark to 
Azure in order he would be able to see any detail that might help 
them.

Perceptor noticed a intruder in the intranet and said "Someone is 
inside"

Hydras cursed aloud and said by a comlink to Perceptor, Jhiaxus and 
Zarak. 

"Zarak, please take the LAdy and leave her in her cell after we leave 
with Dark Rodimus, follow this corritor and use same password" Hydras 
sent an alternative route "If she gives troubles, do whatever you 
want. Perceptor lock down this place, and locate him or her; Trelos 
and Jhiaxus, follow me!"

Perceptor activated the defences and the base started to sink in the 
lava lake, the bots inside wouldnt be in danger 'cause the base was 
desinged to do this with the warantee that nobody inside would be 
hurt. After that Perceptor activated Dark Rodimus and started to 
track the intruder.
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Dark Rodimus::
> 
> The new Generation Decepticon sits and waits for an activation 
order.
> 
> Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
> 
> --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
> 
> > ::Dark Rodimus::
> > 
> > In his sub-councious Dark Rodimus can feel the spider spy on him
> > and the probe inserted into the base of his neck. He wants to 
reach
> > back scratch the "itch" but his body is still in a dorment
> > deactivated state. He does nothing for now.
> 
> As the probe made contact with Dark Rodimus' spinal command module
> (think brain stem) The probe swiftly began doing what it is 
programmed
> to do - upload information, images, and data lifted from Rodimus'
> cerebral cortex. Meanwhile the spider spy, hidden as it is, settled
> down and fed, becoming totally motionless, perhaps even appearing 
to be
> part of Dark Rodimus himself.
> 
> Preston
>
